text:
Delicious authentic Xing Hua dishes. Fresh seafood. Reminds me of my late grandma's cooking.

Make reservation so you won't have to wait. Large round tables available on level 2. Perfect for a meal with family.

Will be back for another meal.

(Save & Share) A great place for comfort food that hits all the right notes for friends and family - Xing Hua Family Restaurant Highlights!

1Ô∏è‚É£ XING HUA FRIED BEE HOON (ÂÖ¥ÂåñÁÇíÁ±≥Á≤â)
Light, springy rice vermicelli that‚Äôs packed with flavor! The Xing Hua Fried Bee Hoon is stir-fried to perfection. Generously topped with crunchy peanuts and fresh seafood, it‚Äôs a satisfying balance of texture and umami goodness in every bite.

2Ô∏è‚É£ XING HUA BRAISED NOODLES (ÂÖ¥ÂåñÂç§Èù¢)
If you‚Äôre looking for comfort food, the Braised Noodles are a must-try! Thick, hearty noodles simmered in a rich, savory broth that soaks up all the flavor. Each mouthful is full of warmth, perfect for a cozy meal.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Deep Fried Chicken with Garlic Sauce (ËíúËå∏ËÑÜÁöÆÈ∏°)
Crispy on the outside, tender on the inside, this Deep Fried Chicken is an absolute treat! The garlic sauce is aromatic without being overpowering, enhancing the golden-brown skin with a delicate hint of sweetness. A real crowd-pleaser for anyone who loves their chicken with an extra crunch.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Sweet & Sour Century Egg (Á≥ñÈÜãÁöÆËõã)
An unexpected twist on the traditional! The Sweet & Sour Century Egg offers a burst of flavors‚Äîtangy, sweet, and savory. The century egg‚Äôs creamy texture contrasts with the vibrant sauce, making it a dish you‚Äôll be thinking about long after your meal. A must-try for adventurous foodies!

5Ô∏è‚É£ LOCAL SPINACH WITH SUPERIOR STOCK (‰∏äÊ±§ËããËèú)
Nutrient-packed and deliciously light, the Local Spinach with Superior Stock is a refreshing yet rich vegetable dish. The superior stock, brimming with flavors from pork bones and dried seafood, enhances the spinach‚Äôs delicate earthiness. A perfect complement to the other rich dishes on the table!

Which one‚Äôs your favorite? Let us know in the comments! üòã

#XingHuaFamilyRestaurant #BoonKengEats #SingaporeFood #FoodReview #LocalDelights #BeeHoonLove #NoodleHeaven #CenturyEgg
This store, the food and services are fantastic. The steamed soonhock fish are fresh, and pricing is justifiable. Will recommend friend to dine here.

Dishes are individual portions. Good to share for 2 pax or solo diner. This place serves delicious food that is easy on the pocket!
The pork ribs with lychee are good.  The chilli sauce on the table is spicy! It goes well with noodles, meat, etc.
Will be back to try other dishes.

Food: The standout dishes include lor mee, seaweed soup, side dishes (seaweed and pickled cauliflower). They are generous with the amount of seaweed on the soup and it‚Äôs not oily. The lor mee gravy is thick and savoury which coat the noodles well. The balance of dishes  can be enhanced with their homemade chili sauce.

Atmosphere: The ambiance is cozy and welcoming, making it a great spot for both family meals and casual dining.

Service: While the food is generally well-received, the staff can be inattentive, especially during busy times.
